snippet: Rick Santorum's pitch to Iowans is an unsurprising litany of conservative bona fides.
abstract: Rick Santorum's pitch to Iowans is an unsurprising litany of conservative bona fides.
lead_paragraph: BOONE, Iowa -- At a hot, crowded Pizza Ranch this afternoon, where journalists and locals jostled for sight lines and breathing space, Rick Santorum explained why Iowans shouldn't just accept what seems like the inevitable, and settle for Mitt Romney.

headline.main: Rick Santorum at the Pizza Ranch: Don't Vote for That Other Guy
